description: Master pricing list for standing seam metal roofing. This is the single source of truth for all quote calculations.

roofOver.description: Base Installation – Roof-Over (normal difficulty, standard color)

tearOff.description: Base Installation – Tear-Off + New Standing Seam (standard color)

complexRoof.description: Complex Roof (lots of valleys, dormers, hips, cut-up rooflines)

syntheticBase.description: Synthetic Underlayment (Rhino U20) - included in base pricing

iceWaterShield.note: Choose per-square OR per-linear-foot pricing, not both

dripEdge.description: Drip Edge / Eave Metal / Gutter Apron

fasciaMetalRepair.description: Fascia Metal / Fascia Repair (metal cladding, minor carpentry)

snowGuards.description: Snow Guards (standing seam compatible), supply & install

chimneyComplex.description: Complex Chimney Flashing (large, stone chimneys, multi-slope interfaces)

skylightReflash.description: Skylight Re-Flash (existing skylight, new metal roof)

minimums.description: Minimum Standing Seam Job Charge - use when calculated totals fall below this amount

calculationRules.discountPolicy: Never lower pricing automatically. Discounts can be shown or applied only if explicitly toggled in config.
calculationRules.missingDataHandling: If required data (slope, complexity, tear-off yes/no) is missing, give a range but mark: 'Subject to on-site inspection to finalize price.'
